name: Robo Run V8
description: This game is a gorilla tag movement/gorilla tagt fan game. i forgot to change the message of the day but i changed the squid game glass panels being too big and added the caves map you can run around and have fun as a robot and might see me! i have dev cosmetics so you will see me. and im working on making tag, working cosmetics with a map and making my own player model and change the name of the game!
